oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.publicutil
Class OsnUtils

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.oaext.osn.publicutil.OsnUtils

public final class OsnUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Public utility class for interacting with the Oracle Social Network. Methods in this class are designed to work with View Object and Row BC objects.

Since:
11.1.1.7.0
Version:
$Header: atgpf/applcore/applications/Common/Model/src/oracle/apps/fnd/applcore/oaext/osn/publicutil/OsnUtils.java /st_atgpf_11.1.1.7.3/1 2013/12/06 13:45:06 pacross Exp $

Method Detail

isEnvironmentOsnEnabled

public static boolean isEnvironmentOsnEnabled()
Determination whether the environment meets one of the following criteria, which is deemed sufficient for other OSN APIs in this class to work. If this method returns false, OSN integration will not work and other methods in this class will throw exceptions.
  1. No session exists,
  2. ATG Lite enabled,
  3. No OSN libraries are on the classpath,
  4. There is no OSN endpoint in topology manager.

Returns:
true if the environment is OSN enabled, false otherwise.

isVoOsnEnabled

public static boolean isVoOsnEnabled(oracle.jbo.ViewObject vo)
Determine whether the view object is enabled in either AUTOAMATIC or MANUAL mode, and the environment is setup and capable of interacting with osn per isEnvironmentOsnEnabled().

Parameters:
vo - the View Object to check.
Returns:
true if the vo is OSN enabled.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if vo is null.

isVoForRowOsnEnabled

public static boolean isVoForRowOsnEnabled(oracle.jbo.Row row)
Determine whether the view object for row is enabled in either AUTOAMATIC or MANUAL mode, and the environment is setup and capable of interacting with osn per isEnvironmentOsnEnabled().

Parameters:
row - the row from a View Object to check.
Returns:
true if the row is OSN enabled.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if vo is null.

shareOrJoinSocialObject

public static void shareOrJoinSocialObject(oracle.jbo.Row row)
                                    throws OsnPublishException
Create the row instance in OSN if it has not been created already (share), otherwise join the conversation on this row which has been shared by someone else. Assumes isEnvironmentOsnEnabled() == true, however this is not explicitly checked here.

Parameters:
row - the row to share or join to osn to OSN.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.
OsnPublishException - if there is a problem seding row to osn.

getSocialObjectId

public static java.lang.String getSocialObjectId(oracle.jbo.Row row)
Get the identifier for row that will be used for representing the Social Object.

Parameters:
row - the row to send to OSN.
Returns:
The Social Object ID for the row, null if the ViewObject of the row is not osn enabled. Example: ASK.oracle.apps.model.view.SndDemoDeptVO.100
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.

getSocialDefinitionId

public static java.lang.String getSocialDefinitionId(oracle.jbo.Row row)
Get the identifier for Social Definition that the row belongs to.

Parameters:
row - the row to send to OSN.
Returns:
The Social Definition ID for the row, null if the ViewObject of the row is not osn enabled. Example: ASK.oracle.apps.model.view.SndDemoDeptVO
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.

addMember

public static void addMember(oracle.jbo.Row row,
                             java.lang.String member)
                      throws OsnPublishException
Add member to the social object represented by row. Assumes that isVoOsnEnabled(((OAViewRowImpl) row).getViewObject()) == true, but does not explicitly test it.

Parameters:
row - the row to add member to.
member - the user to add.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row or member are null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.
java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem adding the member to Osn.
OsnPublishException

removeMember

public static void removeMember(oracle.jbo.Row row,
                                java.lang.String member)
                         throws OsnPublishException
Remove member from the social object represented by row. Assumes that isVoOsnEnabled(((OAViewRowImpl) row).getViewObject()) == true, but does not explicitly test it.

Parameters:
row - the row to remove member from.
member - the user to remove.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row or member are null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.
java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem removing the member from Osn.
OsnPublishException

isPublished

public static boolean isPublished(oracle.jbo.Row row)
                           throws OsnPublishException
Has the row been published? This will return a valid response whther or not isVoForRowOsnEnabled(row) == true or not. That is the VO may have been enabled for OSN in the past, this row uploaded and now the VO disabled for OSN.

Parameters:
row - the row to check.
Returns:
true if published, false otherwise.
Throws:
OsnPublishException - if any problem with osn infrastructure.

updateSocialObject

public static void updateSocialObject(oracle.jbo.Row row)
                               throws OsnPublishException
Update the row instance in OSN. If it has not been created already (via the shareOrJoinSocialObject API or automatic OSN integration), then this API will attempt to perform a create rather than an update. All OSN enabled attributes will be sent to OSN irrespective if they have been updated or not. Assumes isEnvironmentOsnEnabled() == true, however this is not explicitly checked here.

Parameters:
row - the row to update on OSN.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.
OsnPublishException - if there is a problem sending the row update to OSN.

deleteSocialObject

public static void deleteSocialObject(oracle.jbo.Row row)
                               throws OsnPublishException
Calls OSN with a delete request for the row instance. The OSN server will never delete information so their Delete API perform a close of the conversation for the row. Assumes:
  • isEnvironmentOsnEnabled() == true, however this is not explicitly checked here.
  • isPublished() == true, however this is not explicitly checked here.

Parameters:
row - the row to "delete" in OSN.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if row is null.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if row not instanceof OAViewRowImpl.
OsnPublishException - if there is a problem sending or executing the delete request on OSN.
